mapper.update:
update FCRMTOT
FCRMTOT_REG_COUNT = NVL(FCRMTOT_REG_COUNT, 0) + #{fcrmtotRegCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_REG_AMT = NVL(FCRMTOT_REG_AMT, 0) + #{fcrmtotRegAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_FISC_OUT_COUNT = NVL(FCRMTOT_FISC_OUT_COUNT, 0) + #{fcrmtotFiscOutCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_FISC_OUT_AMT = NVL(FCRMTOT_FISC_OUT_AMT, 0) + #{fcrmtotFiscOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_CBS_OUT_COUNT = NVL(FCRMTOT_CBS_OUT_COUNT, 0) + #{fcrmtotCbsOutCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_CBS_OUT_AMT = NVL(FCRMTOT_CBS_OUT_AMT, 0) + #{fcrmtotCbsOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_FISC_IN_COUNT = NVL(FCRMTOT_FISC_IN_COUNT, 0) + #{fcrmtotFiscInCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_FISC_IN_AMT = NVL(FCRMTOT_FISC_IN_AMT, 0) + #{fcrmtotFiscInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_CBS_IN_COUNT = NVL(FCRMTOT_CBS_IN_COUNT, 0) + #{fcrmtotCbsInCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCRMTOT_CBS_IN_AMT = NVL(FCRMTOT_CBS_IN_AMT, 0) + #{fcrmtotCbsInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_USERID = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE,
where FCRMTOT_TXDATE = #{fcrmtotTxdate,jdbcType=CHAR} and FCRMTOT_BRNO = #{fcrmtotBrno,jdbcType=CHAR} and FCRMTOT_CURRENCY = #{fcrmtotCurrency,jdbcType=CHAR}
